General.Name: Will Semiconductor Co Ltd
General.Description: Will Semiconductor Co., Ltd. a semiconductor design company, provides sensor solutions, analog solutions and touch screen and display solutions. The company offers application specific integrated circuits, power management devices, diodes, FETs, triode BJTs, protective devices, low noise amplifiers, RF switches, tuners, image sensors, signal circuits, audio devices, touch and display solutions, and microcontrollers. Its products are used in mobile phones, security, automotive electronics, wearable devices, IoT, communications, computers, consumer electronics, industry, medical, and other fields. The company was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.
